original_text: For if that first covenant had been faultless, then should no place have been sought for the second.
korean_text: 저 첫 언약이 무흠하였더라면 둘째 것을 요구할 일이 없었으려니와

sentences.original_text: For if that first covenant had been faultless
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 첫 번째 언약이 흠이 없었다면

sentences.original_text: then should no place have been sought
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇다면 아무 곳도 찾아볼 필요가 없었을 것입니다
